results.title: Impact of hyperglycemia and treatment with metformin on ligature-induced bone loss, bone repair and expression of bone metabolism transcription factors
results.text_hl: However, up to now, the effects of @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ either associated or not with treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on alveolar bone metabolism has not been evaluated in situations of repair or relative to the induction of @<m>DISEASE_Periodontitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@.

results.title: Tetrahedral Framework Nucleic Acid (tFNA)-Loaded Metformin (Met) Modulates Cellular Pyroptosis and AMPK to Ameliorate Type II Diabetic Periodontitis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) is recognized for its potent anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ properties, yet its limited cellular uptake has hindered its clinical effectiveness in @<m>DISEASE_Periodontitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@diabetic periodontitis@@@.
